And stay Down

Normal damage. Crit Effect: The target is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Prone]{Prone} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Stunned]{Stunned 2}.

Bludgeoning

Ventilated

Triple damage.

Piercing

Knockback

Push the target up to 10 feet.

Slashing

Frozen

If this is a cold bomb or spell, the target takes triple damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Slowed]{Slowed 2} for 1 round. Any other bomb or spell deals double damage.
